settings.name: Continuous raster file
settings.description: You can upload local raster files with continuous data for running the resource selection function analysis. Make sure that they overlap with the tracking data set and are in WGS 84 projection! The App requires the following files, named exactly as given: 1. `raster.tif`. Note that fallback raster files of elevation, forest cover, Landcover and human modification are provided

settings.name: Categorical raster file
settings.description: You can upload local categorical raster files for running the resource selection function analysis. Make sure that they overlap with the tracking data set and are in WGS 84 projection! The App requires the following files, named exactly as given: 1. `raster_cat.tif`.

settings.name: Whether the resource selection analysis is done at a individual level or population level
settings.description: Specify if the resource selction analysis is done to be individualwise or for the population. Selecting the value TRUE runs the resource selection model individualwise and FALSE runs the population model.

settings.name: How many layers does the raster uploaded by user have
settings.description: Specify if the raster uploaded by the user has a single layer or multiple layers
